playlist_title: Firebase with Reactjs | Complete Firebase in Hindi

videos.title: Full Stack React & Firebase Tutorial | Firebase React Tutorial Series
videos.description:
Hello Everyone,
I am Piyush Garg and I am going to start a new series on ReactJS + Firebase where are going to learn how we can use firebase inside our react app. We would also learn about Firebase Authentication, Realtime Database, Firestore, and storage in the cloud.
At the end of this series, we will also build a buy-sell application using firebase and reactJS.

Complete Firebase & React Series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLinedj3B30sCw8Qjrct1DRglx4hWQx83C

My Gears
► Apple MacBook Pro Laptop: https://amzn.to/3DqSQPK
► Canon EOS 1500D 24.1 Digital SLR Camera: https://amzn.to/3RKmF1Y
► Logitech MK295 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse: https://amzn.to/3DuL1bB
► Seagate Expansion 1TB External HDD: https://amzn.to/3QMm5Q8
► Tripod: https://amzn.to/3S4OwK4

Disclaimer
► All the links above are affiliate links.

Links
Firebase: https://firebase.google.com/
My Website: https://piyushgarg.dev

videos.title: What is Firebase? | ReactJS with Firebase Tutorial Hindi | Firebase React Tutorial Series
videos.description:
Hello Everyone,
My name is Piyush Garg and in this video, we are going to see how we can create a free Firebase account and will have a basic walkthrough of the firebase console. Along with that, we would be discussing some most commonly used services that are provided by the firebase such as firebase authentication, firebase real-time database, firebase storage, firebase firestore, etc.

Links
Firebase Console: https://firebase.google.com/
My website: https://piyushgarg.dev/


Video Links
React API and Data Fetching - https://youtu.be/JFBYU1JC_f4
React Context API in one video - https://youtu.be/73Tz6qTgNuU
React Router DOM - https://youtu.be/Sng7wtlhWlw
React Weather API App - https://youtu.be/-d5OHgw34g4
React TicTacToe Game - https://youtu.be/pw2krTJLF6Y

Firebase React Series 
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLinedj3B30sCw8Qjrct1DRglx4hWQx83C

Complete React 18 Series
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLinedj3B30sCHqHtgbjg1lSYgWebm1dyI

Timestamps

00:15 Creating our first project
01:47 Our Project Dashboard in Firebase
02:48 Firebase Authentication
03:02 Firebase Firestore Database
03:21 Firebase Real-Time Database
04:05 Firebase Cloud Storage
04:32 Other Firebase Services and Features
04:55 Outro

videos.title: How to Set Up A React and Firebase Project
videos.description:
Hello Everyone,
My name is Piyush Garg and In this video, we will learn how we can connect ours react application to our firebase console. We will also check our connection using firebase's real-time database.

Hello Everyone,
My name is Piyush Garg and in this video, we are going to see how we can create a free Firebase account and will have a basic walkthrough of the firebase console. Along with that, we would be discussing some most commonly used services that are provided by the firebase such as firebase authentication, firebase real-time database, firebase storage, firebase firestore, etc.
